infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: BioSign uses the camera to capture documents that you upload for signing. For example, you can take a photo of a contract or invoice to sign within the app.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: BioSign needs access to your photo library to let you select existing images or documents that you want to upload and sign. For example, you can choose a scanned file from your gallery to sign.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: BioSign can save signed or scanned documents to your photo library when you choose to. For example, you can export a signed document and keep a copy in your gallery.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: We use Face ID to securely unlock the app and protect your data.
